Table.SCRIPT: A group of scientists wanted to know if smells can [{affect}] the sorts of dreams we have. So, the scientists did some [{experiments}]. They had one group of people sleep in a room that smelled like [{roses}]. The next morning, the scientists [{interviewed}] the people. The people said they had good dreams. The scientists had the other group of people sleep in a room that smelled like [{rotten}] eggs. The smell was [{terrible}]. The people said they had bad dreams. The experiment seemed to show us a way to [{avoid}] bad dreams.
Table.TITLE: Testing Dreams
